title: Can a gun shop and repair business fire a gun in the city limits...the business(in a CB zone) is 25feet or less from a residential neighborhood. Have searched the internet to find out the answer. City ordinances say no. Please do not use my name in any inquires. Thank you.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/06/can-a-gun-shop-and-repair-business-fire-a-gun-in-the-city-limits/
